title: More then 1 S rating?
body: i was wondering if you can get another S rating on champs (getting chest and keys)

replies.body:
The chest-per-season has already been reset for the 2017 season, but you can still only earn one chest per champion for each season.

Find out more in our [**Hextech Crafting Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide). Let me know if you have any questions.
